name: Light Me Up
description:
Fight against the dark poluted seas. You are the only one who can bring the needed energy to the coralls to clear the pulution! 

All rights reserved (c) 2019, created by: Mehtap Kurucay Deren Saylik Matthias Voigt Yunxu Sang

The prototype was created on GameDesign // UE at the European University of Applied Sciences . Supervisor: Richard Boeser  "Game Week" (Summer   Semester)
